message.content:
{
  "weekly_summary": "Constructive but range-bound week for mid/small caps. Leadership rotated through exchanges/depositories (BSE, CDSL) and select PSU/cap goods (BHEL). Telecom towers (IndusTower) continued to coil under resistance; rail PSUs (RVNL/IRCON) based below triggers. Pharma mixed (Laurus cooled but held structure). Metals softened (SAIL/HindCopper). Our focus remains on high-quality themes showing relative strength, buying near support or on confirmed breakouts with tight risk.",
  "trades": [
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "BSE",
      "shares": 1,
      "amount": 2858.30,
      "reason": "Add on controlled dip near support; exchange theme remains strong. Risk manageable below ~2790; looking for a push back toward 2915–2960."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "CDSL",
      "shares": 1,
      "amount": 1610.20,
      "reason": "Add near the 1605–1615 retest zone with clear risk marker (~1580). Participation in exchanges/depositories theme with improving breadth."
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 3785.45,
    "total_value": 27523.20,
    "holdings_count": 4,
    "holdings": [
      "GMRAIRPORT: 45 units @ ~104.05",
      "BHEL: 20 units @ ~281.30",
      "BSE: 3 units @ ~2858.80/2858.30",
      "CDSL: 3 units @ ~1610.20"
    ],
    "weekly_pnl": "+0.8%"
  },
  "screening_changes": [
    "Remove ANANDRATHI: Liquidity/volatility not favorable versus stronger exchange plays (BSE/MCX).",
    "Remove METROPOLIS: Consistently low volumes and relative underperformance vs Dr Lal PathLabs.",
    "Remove SUMICHEM: Momentum lost; no active setup and weak relative strength.",
    "Remove FACT: Range-bound, catalyst-light; better opportunities in PSU/cap goods elsewhere.",
    "Remove AFFLE: Choppy, inconsistent trend; reallocating attention to clearer momentum names."
  ]
}
